workExperience.title: Analyst
responsibilities: Managed the P&Ls for multiple business units, including Bags, Ready to Wear, Footwear, Photo Studio, and Merchandise, under Coach Design & Global Marketing. Collaborated with the design teams to develop and implement cost-saving initiatives.
Present cost flows to track cost initiatives and report supply chain/financial headwinds and cross department breakdown of P&L per category to track gross margin across multiple business units.
Utilized command line interfaces to manipulate CSV databases for ad hoc analysis and reporting.

workExperience.title: Corporate Banking Analyst
responsibilities: Collaborated closely with C-level executives, finance managers, and accounting staff to conduct due diligence on potential secured credit commitments, utilizing analytical skills to evaluate and manage company risk profiles. Conducted thorough collateral audits on existing portfolio companies to recommend adjustments to total credit extension.

Analyzed and interpreted historical performance trends, cash flow strength, collateral coverage, and private equity sponsor involvement, utilizing advanced software tools to calculate key profitability and leverage indicators such as free cash flow, unfunded Capex, and estimated fixed charge coverage ratio.

workExperience.title: Financial Analyst
responsibilities: Assisted senior corporate finance analysts in preparing internal monthly operational reports for use by company executive and private equity sponsor group. Reporting breaks down and summarizes key performance indicators and company financials by region for comparison between actual vs. budgeted figures.
Created databases and VBA macros to provide ease of data manipulation for analysis and effectively decreased turnaround time for reporting/analysis by 2 days.

featuredProjects.name: US Data App
featuredProjects.description: Data Visualization app based on US Census & Fred Economic Data. Broad overview of diversity, population, housing, and economic conditions utilizing publicly accessible APIs.

featuredProjects.name: Swapesy
featuredProjects.description: A mobile ecommerce app for trading card enthusiasts. Users can interact with each other via our real-time messaging platform and trade/purchase cards.

featuredProjects.name: AlbumGuessr
featuredProjects.description: A web game utilizing Spotify search data, and webplayback SDK. Match the currently played track to the correct album cover, earn points and keep track of the top scorers on the leaderboard

featuredProjects.name: DiscordSMS
featuredProjects.description: Manage your marketing and event list with SMS and Discord.

otherProjects.name: Audiospace

otherProjects.name: GPT Market Analytics
otherProjects.description: An API utilizing GPT to process and compare news articles about the top companies in a given industry

otherProjects.name: SunChip
otherProjects.description: Designed and implemented a secure backend and database for a fashion ecommerce store hosted using AWS EC2. Implemented caching via NGNIX and horizontal scaling via AWS.

otherProjects.description: Functional ecommerce front-end with extensive product selections and articles.
